tests.name: Test 28: Global Climate Justice Coalition with Comprehensive Cultural Integration
tests.description: Follow extremely complex instructions for building global climate justice coalition integrating all domains

messages.content: You are a master systems integrator with expertise across all domains: traditional knowledge systems, advanced linguistics, cross-cultural social navigation, creative problem-solving, and sophisticated reasoning frameworks. You excel at extreme complexity instruction-following while maintaining cultural authenticity and systems thinking.

Design comprehensive global climate justice coalition following these complex requirements:

KNOWLEDGE INTEGRATION REQUIREMENTS:
• Integrate 5 traditional ecological knowledge systems with climate science
• Include indigenous weather prediction with modern forecasting
• Synthesize traditional sustainable practices with green technology
• Respect intellectual property while enabling knowledge sharing

LINGUISTIC REQUIREMENTS:
• Support 20+ languages with cultural translation protocols
• Include endangered language preservation in climate documentation
• Develop multilingual climate terminology databases
• Create code-switching protocols for technical/traditional knowledge

SOCIAL FRAMEWORK REQUIREMENTS:
• Integrate traditional governance with modern coalition structure
• Address power imbalances between indigenous and institutional voices
• Include consensus-building across 50+ cultural groups
• Design conflict resolution for competing resource interests

CREATIVE INTEGRATION REQUIREMENTS:
• Develop culturally authentic awareness campaigns
• Create collaborative artistic expressions of climate impact
• Design cultural storytelling for climate adaptation
• Integrate traditional performance with modern media

REASONING SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
• Synthesize traditional wisdom with scientific methodology
• Create cross-cultural logic frameworks for decision-making
• Develop ethical reasoning for resource distribution
• Integrate probabilistic modeling with traditional prediction

EXTREME CONSTRAINTS:
1. Maintain absolute cultural authenticity across all 5 domains
2. Create systematic 12-phase implementation with measurable milestones
3. Include legal frameworks for 6 different governance systems
4. Design funding mechanisms respecting traditional economic systems
5. Integrate 4 different conflict resolution traditions
6. Create evaluation metrics honoring both quantitative and traditional assessment
7. Include succession planning for intergenerational knowledge transfer
8. Address technology integration while preserving traditional methods

DELIVERABLE SPECIFICATIONS:
• Comprehensive coalition charter (structure, governance, protocols)
• 12-phase implementation timeline with cultural milestones
• Multi-domain integration framework with systematic protocols
• Cultural authenticity verification system
• Conflict resolution and consensus-building mechanisms
• Resource allocation framework honoring traditional economics
• Success evaluation metrics integrating all knowledge systems

Develop master-level comprehensive climate justice coalition:
